handler.name: CoD: Modern Warfare 2
handler.author: wunner
handler.info: BEFORE RUNNING THIS HANDLER, install IW4x on your copy of MW2 by using alterware-launcher. If the launcher asks you to reconfigure video settings, click No. One instance should host a game, the rest can join by opening up the server browser and changing the type to LAN. The host's server may take a while to show up in the browser after being created.
